ideaItems.title: Template blurb generation from RoomFeatures fields
ideaItems.body: TASK-06 blurb authoring used LLM reasoning; a deterministic template could produce boilerplate copy from structured feature data, but quality would be lower for a conversion-critical page

ideaItems.title: DOM-order test as a conversion-safety pattern
ideaItems.body: new test file mirrors book-page-social-proof-order.test.tsx — both enforce critical above-the-fold ordering invariants on the book page. A third ordering constraint (e.g. deal banner position) could use the same pattern

ideaItems.title: Track GA4 funnel drop-off in Explorations once custom dimensions are visible (48h)
ideaItems.body: Full funnel confirmed firing; no conversion rate baseline exists yet
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (check at T+7 days when custom dimensions propagate)

ideaItems.title: Auto-trigger xa-b Cloudflare Pages rebuild after sync
ideaItems.body: Post-save message currently requires operator to rebuild manually; V1 decision deferred this. A deploy-hook API call after sync would close the gap.

ideaItems.title: Category assignment helper: batch-assign categories to inventory items via CSV or UI bulk edit
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 found category field is free-text with no UI picker; operator must assign manually item-by-item — a slow process for 20–60 items

ideaItems.title: Exchange rate feed from external source
ideaItems.body: Operator manually enters EUR/GBP/AUD multipliers. An automated rate feed (e.g. fixer.io, Open Exchange Rates) could keep them current.

ideaItems.title: Automate periodic smoke test runs against production (e.g. weekly cron) so GA4 event regressions are caught without manual operator invocation
ideaItems.body: smoke test is manual-only; value of the assertion is bounded by run frequency

ideaItems.title: Track blind-mode variance improvement rate via till discrepancy Firebase records
ideaItems.body: the feature aims to reduce cash discrepancies caused by anchoring bias but has no post-deployment measurement path wired in

ideaItems.title: Add a standing HBAG PDP funnel feed for GA4 view_item and begin_checkout events
ideaItems.body: the intended outcome depends on this KPI, but build evidence states GA4-based measurement is not yet available in this cycle

ideaItems.title: Post-activation GA4 verification step for room detail select_item
ideaItems.body: Baseline shows 0 select_item from room_detail; after deploying to production and activating NEXT_PUBLIC_OCTORATE_LIVE_AVAILABILITY, a follow-up query (28-day window from activation date) should confirm non-zero select_item counts from room_detail. This is the measurement step the baseline enables.

ideaItems.title: Add session_id or caller_pid to governed telemetry event schema to enable actor attribution in future zombie incidents.
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 could not confirm actor identity with 80% confidence; no session metadata in events.jsonl.

ideaItems.title: Capture select_item baseline on room detail pages before flag activation
ideaItems.body: Outcome contract specifies select_item rate as the measurement metric; no baseline captured pre-build

ideaItems.title: Track direct booking share weekly post-deploy to close the measurement loop
ideaItems.body: build sets up GA4 CTA click event proxy but no standing measurement cadence exists

ideaItems.title: Naming pipeline sidecar logs for per-round naming analytics
ideaItems.body: Per-candidate stage event logs accumulate across naming rounds (docs/business-os/strategy/ /naming-sidecars/). Once 3+ live rounds exist: structured dataset for quantitative analysis of naming patterns, yield trends, and operator preferences. Currently empty — will fill as naming rounds run.

ideaItems.title: Email provider upgrade to Resend for better deliverability + bounce tracking
ideaItems.body: sendSystemEmail via Gmail SMTP silently simulates if credentials absent; no delivery confirmation or bounce visibility
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer until submission volume justifies upgrade

ideaItems.title: New loop process: Introduce a lightweight deployment-activation evidence checkpoint before using Met for intended outcomes containing the word "live"
ideaItems.body: the intended statement includes "live", but available evidence for this build is implementation + tests only

ideaItems.title: Materializer CLI fails silently when run from the wrong working directory
ideaItems.body: pnpm --filter scripts startup-loop:materialize-site-content-payload resolves repoRoot to the scripts/ package directory, causing a "Missing source packet" error with no helpful diagnostic about the cwd.
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card — add a cwd sanity check to the materializer CLI (detect when docs/ is not a subdirectory of process.cwd() and emit a helpful error).

ideaItems.title: Phase 4 enforcement gate — wire effective_priority_rank into the queue as a production constraint, blocking low-tier ideas from the DO lane until high-tier ideas clear
ideaItems.body: this build wired classification into the scheduler in advisory mode; Phase 4 requirement was explicitly deferred in the classifier
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — create card after ~4 weeks of trial data

ideaItems.title: Phase 4 enforcement — wire priority rank into dispatch sort and enforce evidence gates
ideaItems.body: Phase 4 deferred in classifier with explicit comment; natural next step after advisory calibration period
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card after ~2 weeks of trial data

ideaItems.title: E2E coverage for J2 error paths (validation failure, pipeline failure, empty-input 409)
ideaItems.body: TC-09-03 added only the success path; the plan explicitly deferred error-path coverage as non-goals. Now that the success path is tested, error paths are the natural next expansion.

ideaItems.title: Classify which mutation hook methods can be safely queued offline automatically
ideaItems.body: This build required manual method-by-method review to identify read-before-write patterns across 51 mutation files — a repeatable categorisation task

ideaItems.title: New loop process — codemoot run output-to-disk bridge: this build discovered that codemoot run text output is never written to disk. A bridging mechanism (parse session DB → apply text diff to target file) could enable codemoot run for text-artifact tasks without requiring the manual inline fallback used here.
ideaItems.body: codemoot run iterated 3 times in the results-review session and never wrote the file; Claude had to write inline

ideaItems.title: Queue state persistence — the classification field is currently in-memory only; adding it to the serialized queue-state.json would allow backfill to survive process restarts
ideaItems.body: classification is set on QueueEntry after enqueue and lost on re-hydration

ideaItems.title: The reflection debt emitter currently runs as a TypeScript script triggered by pnpm --filter scripts startup-loop:generate-process-improvements. The five-category scan in the pre-fill step is still LLM reasoning (agent reads build context and scans). A future mechanistic check could diff the New Idea Candidates section of committed results-reviews against the five category labels and flag missing categories as a lint warning.
ideaItems.body: this build added a structured five-category checklist to step 2, revealing that compliance checking (are all five categories addressed?) is a deterministic pattern-match, not a reasoning task

ideaItems.title: Visual diff test for process-map HTML to catch silent regressions
ideaItems.body: swim-lane layout was browser-verified manually; no regression test exists

ideaItems.title: None (new loop process: no missing stage or gate identified)
ideaItems.body: None (new loop process: no missing stage or gate identified)

ideaItems.title: None for: new standing data source, new open-source package, new skill, new loop process, AI-to-mechanistic.
ideaItems.body: None for: new standing data source, new open-source package, new skill, new loop process, AI-to-mechanistic.

ideaItems.title: New loop process — CI-only build validation: This build validated that IMPLEMENT tasks can complete correctly using only grep/bash TCs (no local Jest run), confirming that CI-only policy does not impede the build loop. Trigger observation: all 9 acceptance criteria passed using non-Jest validation commands. Suggested next action: update docs/testing-policy.md TC examples to emphasise grep/bash-based TCs as the preferred form for policy tasks. Create card.
ideaItems.body: New loop process — CI-only build validation: This build validated that IMPLEMENT tasks can complete correctly using only grep/bash TCs (no local Jest run), confirming that CI-only policy does not impede the build loop. Trigger observation: all 9 acceptance criteria passed using non-Jest validation commands. Suggested next action: update docs/testing-policy.md TC examples to emphasise grep/bash-based TCs as the preferred form for policy tasks. Create card.

ideaItems.title: None: no new standing data sources, skills, loop processes, or AI-to-mechanistic opportunities identified from this build
ideaItems.body: None: no new standing data sources, skills, loop processes, or AI-to-mechanistic opportunities identified from this build

ideaItems.title: New loop process: post-build re-scan to confirm gap was satisfied
ideaItems.body: skill emits dispatches for gaps but has no mechanism to close/resolve dispatches when a satisfying artifact is later created; a post-build coverage-check step would close the feedback loop
ideaItems.suggested_action: add to lp-weekly integration scope in companion packet 0032

ideaItems.title: Product naming pipeline as a reusable skill
ideaItems.body: the facilella-product-naming-pipeline plan was designed as a standalone pipeline analogous to the company naming pipeline, but no lp-do-product-naming-pipeline skill exists — each future business that wants a rigorous product naming run would need to re-plan from scratch
ideaItems.suggested_action: create a skill document at .claude/skills/lp-do-product-naming-pipeline/SKILL.md encoding this pipeline as a repeatable agent workflow (spec → generate → TM direction → shortlist)

ideaItems.title: Enforce one-per-day opening float with server-side dedup instead of client-side some() check
ideaItems.body: multiple rapid taps before the submitting state disables the button could still queue duplicate Firebase writes; some() handles display correctly but does not prevent duplicate records in the database
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — the submitting boolean state mitigates the primary race condition; strict dedup can be added as a future hardening task if duplicate records surface in production audit logs.

ideaItems.title: New loop process — codemoot route as named layer in critique-loop-protocol.md
ideaItems.body: the protocol now has two routes (codemoot + inline fallback); the selection logic could be extracted as a named "critique-router" sub-skill for cleaner protocol evolution
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — low priority; current inline implementation is clear enough

ideaItems.title: Classifier auto-demotion rate dashboard for Phase 4 readiness
ideaItems.body: all dispatches auto-demote to P4/P5 without operator evidence fields; a weekly count would surface this clearly

ideaItems.title: Add CI drift check step using check-process-improvements to catch SKIP_SIMPLE_GIT_HOOKS bypasses
ideaItems.body: SKIP_SIMPLE_GIT_HOOKS=1 is used by bos-export and would bypass the hook
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (bos-export does not touch plan files, so this is low risk in practice)

ideaItems.title: The wave build execution for this plan (three independent S-effort markdown edits) was orchestrated manually. A docs-patch skill that handles batches of bounded markdown edits to SKILL.md files (verify current state, apply edit, verify result, commit) would eliminate the lp-do-build overhead for this class of purely-additive process-doc changes.
ideaItems.body: all three tasks were trivial file edits with identical Red/Green/Refactor structure

ideaItems.title: Expose cashVariance trend over time in ManagerAuditContent
ideaItems.body: cashVariance is now stored per-day — a 7-day rolling view would surface systematic cash shortfall patterns

ideaItems.title: Add openedByUid to TillShift schema for robust same-user UID comparison at close
ideaItems.body: DrawerOverrideModal same-user block falls back to name comparison when UID absent — a known limitation documented in plan

ideaItems.title: Show override fields in TillShiftHistory table
ideaItems.body: override data written to Firebase but TillShiftHistory uses explicit columns — override details invisible to managers reviewing shift history

ideaItems.title: Add a deterministic locale-key parity check for required i18n keys across locale namespace files when adding picker UI
ideaItems.body: this build manually propagated new keys to EN plus 17 non-EN locale files across two namespaces — no automated gate existed to catch missing keys

ideaItems.title: Reuse react-day-picker as the standard range-calendar primitive across other booking or date surfaces to retire any remaining duplicated native date-input patterns
ideaItems.body: this build promoted react-day-picker to a direct dependency and replaced four native input flows across all Brikette booking surfaces

ideaItems.title: Auto-generate results-review when build-record reaches Complete
ideaItems.body: results-review artifact was missing at plan completion; build-record was written but results-review required a separate manual step

ideaItems.title: Add a pre-merge materializer-parity gate for manual site-content.generated.json extensions
ideaItems.body: the plan documents that the materializer does not model productPage.trustStrip; _manualExtension is a temporary guard and a follow-on mitigation task is explicitly noted in the plan non-goals

ideaItems.title: Track notify-me submissions in a lightweight DB table (Prisma + D1) to enable follow-up campaigns when new stock arrives
ideaItems.body: v1 fire-and-forget sends to merchant inbox — no queryable capture store for automated follow-up

ideaItems.title: Room names in dropdown are English-only — translate room names in dropdown to IT/DE/FR locales
ideaItems.body: ROOM_DROPDOWN_NAMES in roomNames.ts is hardcoded EN; non-English visitors will see English room names in the Rooms dropdown

ideaItems.title: Static base-price display on /rooms (no-date context)
ideaItems.body: plan explicitly deferred showing price on /rooms when no dates are set — cards show button only
ideaItems.suggested_action: create card (follow-on feature; would complete the price-display story for the /rooms page)

ideaItems.title: New skill — Codex offload flag discovery: the --dangerously-bypass-approvals-and-sandbox flag replaces the deprecated -a never flag in current codex exec. The build-offload-protocol.md references the old flag. This is a recurring maintenance need for the build loop.
ideaItems.body: Build offload failed with unexpected argument '-a' on TASK-01; required flag discovery before Codex could be used.
ideaItems.suggested_action: Update build-offload-protocol.md to use current flag syntax (create card or inline fix on next skill update cycle).

ideaItems.title: Add a gate that checks the results-review artifact is filled before a plan is marked archived
ideaItems.body: This completion step has no hard enforcement — the build record and results-review can be skipped without blocking archiving

ideaItems.title: Add Playwright smoke test for /api/availability to CI on the Worker build path
ideaItems.body: availability-smoke.spec.ts is not in standard CI (noted in plan Risks); every production deploy activates live pricing without automated regression coverage

ideaItems.title: Add a mandatory checkpoint check for "test exists vs test must be created" before approving any "unskip existing test" task

ideaItems.title: Ops-inbox skill must pass reservationCode on agreement_received to activate WEAK-B1 fix

ideaItems.title: Fix OPERATIONS_ACCESS to include admin/manager roles
ideaItems.body: roles.ts gives staff OPERATIONS_ACCESS but not admin/manager — Cristiana can reach management features but not basic operations features Alessandro can reach. Likely an omission in the original permissions design.

ideaItems.title: Typed RoomImages schema to replace flat imagesRaw: string[]
ideaItems.body: this build trimmed room_3 and room_5 imagesRaw manually; typed image slots (landing, gallery, terrace, bathroom) would make cross-borrowing impossible and enable richer image alt-text

ideaItems.title: Fix protocol-relative URL bypass in link allowlist
ideaItems.body: isAllowlistedUrl accepts //evil.com (starts with /); fix: url.startsWith('/') && !url.startsWith('//')

ideaItems.title: New skill — plans-lint rule extension pattern: The approach of adding a checkXxxPatterns() function with inline-exemption markers to plans-lint.ts is a repeatable pattern for new policy-enforcement lint rules (e.g., a future "no hardcoded URLs" rule or "no deprecated env var" rule). Trigger observation: TASK-07 extended plans-lint successfully in ~30 lines with path-based and inline exemptions, no schema changes needed. Suggested next action: defer — document the pattern in plans-lint.ts file comments when a second rule is added.
ideaItems.body: New skill — plans-lint rule extension pattern: The approach of adding a checkXxxPatterns() function with inline-exemption markers to plans-lint.ts is a repeatable pattern for new policy-enforcement lint rules (e.g., a future "no hardcoded URLs" rule or "no deprecated env var" rule). Trigger observation: TASK-07 extended plans-lint successfully in ~30 lines with path-based and inline exemptions, no schema changes needed. Suggested next action: defer — document the pattern in plans-lint.ts file comments when a second rule is added.

ideaItems.title: PCI DSS SAQ D acknowledgment required before production deployment
ideaItems.body: S2S mode passes raw card numbers through the server; PCI scope is SAQ D vs SAQ A for hosted checkout
ideaItems.suggested_action: operator confirms PCI compliance posture before enabling PAYMENTS_PROVIDER=axerve in production

ideaItems.title: Coverage manifest initialization for BRIK and PWRB
ideaItems.body: lp-coverage-scan skill is ready; BRIK and PWRB have no manifests yet; the scanner cannot run until manifests exist
ideaItems.suggested_action: companion packet IDEA-DISPATCH-20260226-0032 already covers this; no new card needed

ideaItems.title: Stripe test-mode end-to-end checkout flow on staging
ideaItems.body: TASK-11 + TASK-12 complete but no real payment tested — Stripe keys not yet in env
ideaItems.suggested_action: operator sets STRIPE_SECRET_KEY + NEXT_PUBLIC_STRIPE_PUBLISHABLE_KEY in Caryina staging/prod env; then manual payment test with Stripe test card

ideaItems.title: AI-to-mechanistic: The extractFromJsxAttribute utility correctly handles most cases but returns confident: false for template literals with interpolations. A future improvement could expand confidence for template literals where the bare class token is always in the static portion.
ideaItems.body: AI-to-mechanistic: The extractFromJsxAttribute utility correctly handles most cases but returns confident: false for template literals with interpolations. A future improvement could expand confidence for template literals where the bare class token is always in the static portion.

ideaItems.title: AI-to-mechanistic: The extractFromJsxAttribute utility correctly handles most cases but returns confident: false for template literals with interpolations. A future improvement could expand confidence for template literals where the bare class token is always in the static portion.
ideaItems.body: AI-to-mechanistic: The extractFromJsxAttribute utility correctly handles most cases but returns confident: false for template literals with interpolations. A future improvement could expand confidence for template literals where the bare class token is always in the static portion.

ideaItems.title: Validate packaging brief with a real physical-product operator
ideaItems.body: TASK-04 and TASK-03 confidence capped at 80% — regulatory reference data not yet validated against real production experience.
ideaItems.suggested_action: when a physical-product business first runs ASSESSMENT-15, collect feedback and update regulatory-requirements.md.

ideaItems.title: Validate packaging brief with a real physical-product operator
ideaItems.body: TASK-04 and TASK-03 confidence capped at 80% — regulatory reference data not yet validated against real production experience.
ideaItems.suggested_action: when a physical-product business first runs ASSESSMENT-15, collect feedback and update regulatory-requirements.md.

ideaItems.title: Override usage rate monitoring — Firebase closure records with overrideReason set could be counted weekly to detect systematic issues
ideaItems.body: override reason and manager UID are persisted; counting override records gives a signal on operational exceptions
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (no tooling in place yet; could be added to Manager Audit view in future)

ideaItems.title: Design system blanket-disable removal workflow as a reusable skill
ideaItems.body: this build followed a repeatable 4-step pattern (read file → identify violations → place targeted disables → verify with lint) identical to any future XAUP-0001 or equivalent migration

ideaItems.title: Add NEXT_PUBLIC_STANDARD_FLOAT to the operator onboarding checklist or .env.local setup guide
ideaItems.body: the env var defaults to 0 silently; operators who do not set it will always see a blank amount field rather than a pre-filled one
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — low operational friction as staff enter the amount manually; revisit if zero-default causes confusion post-deployment.

ideaItems.title: EOD closure records could feed a daily management summary or audit report
ideaItems.body: eodClosures/ records with confirmedBy and timestamp accumulate over time and could be queried for historical closure patterns.
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — assess after a few weeks of data.

ideaItems.title: EOD closure timestamp could power a "time to close" management KPI
ideaItems.body: all three EOD task states plus the closure timestamp are now available in Firebase for the same date key.
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — low priority, assess if the metric surfaces naturally in operator feedback.

ideaItems.title: Env var pre-flight check as a reusable pattern for other apps
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 introduced a dedicated getCatalogContractReadiness() export to encapsulate env var presence checks; the same pattern (check-then-surface-errors before expensive operations) could be codified as a shared utility or lp-do-build executor pattern for other apps with external service dependencies
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (low frequency; implement when a second app needs it)

ideaItems.title: Xa-uploader deployment runbook — full sequence from clone to live
ideaItems.body: .env.example and wrangler.toml cover the var inventory but not the ordered deployment steps (wrangler login, build, secret setup, deploy)
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (vars were the acute gap; runbook is a nice-to-have)

ideaItems.title: Per-item variance drill-down showing individual ledger entries
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 implementation confirmed per-item memos are computed in-memory; no new data fetching needed

ideaItems.title: Audit entire reception app for remaining Italian strings not covered by this plan
ideaItems.body: Four targeted files were translated; other screens (e.g., Bar, Checkin) were not in scope

ideaItems.title: Add a timestamp of when each action was last completed (e.g., "Last safe reconciliation: 20:34")
ideaItems.body: cards show done/incomplete but no time context, which is useful during close-out
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — requires surfacing timestamp from hook data

ideaItems.title: Add navigation links from each EOD card to the relevant action page (e.g., Cassa card → /till-reconciliation)
ideaItems.body: cards show status but offer no navigation path to complete an incomplete item
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — evaluate after operators use the page in production

ideaItems.title: Add a dispatch SLA to the HBAG logistics policy once a carrier is confirmed (current default is "Delivery estimated at checkout")
ideaItems.body: logistics-pack.user.md uses a safe but non-specific dispatch SLA — specific carrier SLA was not available during build

ideaItems.title: Compiler overwrite risk still relies on a manual warning comment
ideaItems.body: the only guard against compile-website-content-packet --business HBAG overwriting the proof bullets is a markdown blockquote in the packet. If the operator misses it, the materializer will start failing closed with no visible explanation at the compile step.
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — low probability short-term; revisit when compiler is next extended.

ideaItems.title: Markdown section extractor stops at any heading — make it explicit in the function's JSDoc
ideaItems.body: extractBulletList() had no comment explaining the stop-pattern behaviour; the bug was only caught during integration testing. A one-line JSDoc comment would prevent similar bugs.
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (too small to justify a card; add comment opportunistically in next materializer edit).

ideaItems.title: Extract pure transform functions from components for easier unit testing
ideaItems.body: TASK-06 unit tests hit groupItemsByCategory/requiresReauth directly without mounting the full component
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (apply opportunistically during future inventory work)

ideaItems.title: Prime-lint-changed-files.ts uses --max-warnings=0 but regular pnpm lint allows warnings — gap means lint-clean locally can still fail CI
ideaItems.body: eslint-disable suppressions were needed for components that passed local lint
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (known gap; BRIK-2 and PRIME-1 exception tickets exist)

ideaItems.title: Test files missing react-i18next mock when components use useTranslation() — caused silent translation key rendering and React concurrent rendering warnings
ideaItems.body: Two prime test files had no i18n mock; fix required before CI passed
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (one-off fix; pattern is already established in chat test files)

ideaItems.title: Room card copy review: translate "Check Rates" into primary guest locales
ideaItems.body: checkRatesSingle value is English placeholder "Check Rates" in all 18 locales, including DE/IT/FR/ES/RU/ZH
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (minor copy task; operator can update directly when ready)

ideaItems.title: Automate EN i18n fallback propagation as a reusable build utility
ideaItems.body: Python json.load/json.dumps(ensure_ascii=False) pattern used to safely edit 17 multi-byte locale files; this exact pattern will recur on every new i18n key addition across brikette

ideaItems.title: Skill templates drift from repo token names without a detection mechanism
ideaItems.body: lp-design-spec template used shadcn/ui names absent from this repo's token system; caught only by manual fact-check

ideaItems.title: Alert when CF Pages env var bindings diverge from build-cmd inline flag values
ideaItems.body: NEXT_PUBLIC_OCTORATE_LIVE_AVAILABILITY must be set in two places; divergence means feature appears active in client UI but API returns empty rooms
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (low frequency; documented in health check Known Limitation)

ideaItems.title: Design Gate rule could extend to lp-do-fact-find, not just lp-do-plan
ideaItems.body: Design-Spec-Required: yes is only enforced when the plan is being decomposed; a fact-find that encounters a UI-heavy feature has no equivalent upfront signal to request a design spec

ideaItems.title: Document Octorate room matching convention: use numeric data-id not text name
ideaItems.body: Matching required octorateRoomId (data-id) not octorateRoomName text — discovered mid-build

ideaItems.title: Codify a reusable i18n-remediation skill (audit → checkpoint rescore → migration → translation → parity test)
ideaItems.body: TASK-02 through TASK-07 followed this repeatable sequence and produced a clean closure pattern

ideaItems.title: Staff onboarding checklist page in reception app — combine provisioning with role briefing and first-login guide
ideaItems.body: provisioning flow creates the account but no in-app onboarding path exists for new staff after first login

ideaItems.title: Wire getUserByPin into auth flow for shift-PIN staff
ideaItems.body: getUserByPin is fully functional but unwired; marked @deprecated for now. A shift-PIN login path (staff who share a single Firebase account) would use this.

ideaItems.title: Extract getActiveDealCount + deal-status helpers into a shared utility module
ideaItems.body: deal status logic is split across status.ts (getDealStatus) and the new inline filter in deals.ts (getActiveDealCount) — two approaches for the same concern

ideaItems.title: Add an email delivery health check to post-deploy checks so failures surface in CI
ideaItems.body: sendSystemEmail failures are currently only visible in Worker logs — no automated alert

ideaItems.title: Expand keyword allowlist to reduce LLM fallback rate
ideaItems.body: "How do I walk to Fornillo beach?" triggers LLM because "walk to" is not a transport keyword
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (low priority; LLM fallback works correctly)

ideaItems.title: Add CF Pages project creation to pre-deploy operator checklist
ideaItems.body: TASK-08 noted this in edge cases; no automated check exists
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (low urgency — document in PR description)

ideaItems.title: Extract __next.* cleanup into reusable CI composite action
ideaItems.body: MEMORY.md documents the pattern for brikette; xa-b now duplicates it
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (minor — candidate when CI DRY-up is prioritised)

ideaItems.title: Menu item data now lives in apps/prime/src/config/meal-orders/menuData.ts — if menu items change seasonally, an operator-editable config surface (CMS or admin UI) would prevent code deploys for menu updates
ideaItems.body: hardcoded arrays for breakfast foods, egg sides, syrups, and drinks require a code change to add/remove items
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — track as future enhancement when menu changes become frequent

ideaItems.title: Mechanistic linter for "Undefined config key" and "Missing precondition" simulation categories
ideaItems.body: TC-02 for TASK-01 was verified by counting rows — this same count could be run deterministically

ideaItems.title: AI-to-mechanistic: deterministic key formula computation (sha256)
ideaItems.body: ideas-phase uses fallback "prefix anchor_key-fp padded to 64 chars with 0" when SHA-256 is not feasible in agent runtime — a small utility script or prompt helper could make this deterministic and consistent
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer until first live scan surfaces an actual inconsistency

ideaItems.title: Per-business goal artifact initialization for PWRB
ideaItems.body: PWRB strategy directory exists; same blocker applies
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer until BRIK scan validates the skill end-to-end

ideaItems.title: AI-to-mechanistic: lp-coverage-scan staleness detection uses agent file-reading
ideaItems.body: staleness multi-key chain reads frontmatter via agent text parsing; a deterministic TypeScript script could replicate this more reliably and at scale (Phase 2 candidate)

ideaItems.title: Scheduled liveness check for xa- staging Workers
ideaItems.body: xa.yml health checks exist only on deploy; a nightly workflow_dispatch run would confirm Workers remain reachable between deploys
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer (low priority; implement when staging is actively used)

ideaItems.title: Assess whether ASSESSMENT-13/14/15 need prompt template files
ideaItems.body: prompt_required: false set for all three new stages — consistent with skill-file execution but may need revisiting if the loop UI requires prompt templates.
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — assess when first real business runs ASSESSMENT-13.

ideaItems.title: Assess whether ASSESSMENT-13/14/15 need prompt template files
ideaItems.body: prompt_required: false set for all three new stages — consistent with skill-file execution but may need revisiting if the loop UI requires prompt templates.
ideaItems.suggested_action: defer — assess when first real business runs ASSESSMENT-13.

ideaItems.title: Add Jest unit test with fixture JSON mock for gsc-url-inspection-batch.ts extraction logic
ideaItems.body: TC-01 through TC-04 validated by code inspection only; fixture-based test would catch regression on return-type refactors

ideaItems.title: Confirm richResultsResult field presence on next monitoring run against amalfi-positano-bus (one indexed URL) to validate API response shape empirically
ideaItems.body: TASK-01 delivered with optional-chaining fallbacks; no live API response with structured data yet observed for any seed URL

ideaItems.title: Wire lastUpdated through HowToGetHereContent to unlock datePublished on 31 EN transport pages
ideaItems.body: transport pages have no datePublished structured data; monitoring will capture HowTo detection instead of Article when they index

ideaItems.title: Add check_url_strict coverage to other localized booking entry points (e.g., /de/buchen, /fr/reserver)
ideaItems.body: TASK-04 strict check plumbing is now reusable via healthcheck-strict-routes input in reusable-app.yml

ideaItems.title: Add datePublished to monitoring baseline to track when guide pages first appear with valid structured data in search results
ideaItems.body: T+0 baseline has 29 unknown URLs; structured data correctness cannot be validated until pages are indexed

ideaItems.title: Wire lastUpdated prop through HowToGetHereContent to unlock datePublished on transport pages
ideaItems.body: 31 EN transport pages have no lastUpdated in RouteDefinition; datePublished fix was deferred from TASK-03
